text: Pavel Bobek (16 September 1937 − 20 November 2013) was a Czech singer. He worked with many musical artists such as Lou Reed, Johnny Cash, Frank Zappa, Kenny Rogers, and John Denver. Bobek was born on 16 September 1937 in Prague, Czechoslovakia. He studied to become an architect. Bobek died on 20 November 2013 from a long illness in Prague, Czech Republic, aged 76.Ve věku 76 let zemřel zpěvák Pavel Bobek, gentleman české country ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in the Czech Republic Category:Musicians from Prague Category:Czech singers
title: Pavel Bobek
